```{r setup}
require(dplyr)
require(tidyr)
require(knitr)
require(ggplot2)
require(maps)
require(RColorBrewer)
require(summarytools)
```

##Import Breweries Data
```{r}


#import breweries data
breweries_data <- read.csv("../data/Breweries.csv", header=TRUE)

kable(as.data.frame(summarytools::descr(breweries_data)),digits = 2)

view(freq(breweries_data$State, order = "freq"))

breweries_by_state <- select(breweries_data, State, Brew_ID) %>% group_by(State) %>% summarize_all(funs(count=n())) %>% arrange(desc(count))

#overview and summarize

```
